C

Check - Class in controller
Contains all the functions that check the movements.
Check() - Constructor for class controller.Check
 
check(Board, Pedine, int, int) - Static method in class controller.Check
Function that check if the movement of a pedine doesn't jeopardize the same side's king.
check - Variable in class model.Board
Boolean array that tells which king is in check. 0 for white, 1 for black
checkmate(Board, Pedine, Colour) - Static method in class controller.Check
Set the checkmate variable of board.
checkmate - Variable in class model.Board
If true, the game is over
CheckmateTest - Class in test
Class which tests the check and checkmate variables.
CheckmateTest() - Constructor for class test.CheckmateTest
 
Colour - Enum in model
Enumerate the colour type: White, Black or Neuter.
Configuration - Class in controller
Configuration class.
Configuration() - Constructor for class controller.Configuration
 
controller - package controller
